text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @GovMurphy Failure?  There is such a thing for Trumpers?  We have just over 1 million cases of COVID-19 in the United States and the WHO shows 3,090,445 COVID-19 cases globally!  So one third of the cases are HERE.  Yeah GREAT JOB DONALD TRUMP!  You as President are an EPIC DISASTER!
